document.full_text: missouri democratic senator claire mccaskill was flying coach on a commercial flight to st. louis on thursday after days of battering from republicans over her failure to pay taxes on a private airplane she owns.
document.title: missouri senator flies coach after flap over airplane
lines_and_colors: missouri democratic senator claire mccaskill was flying coach on a commercial flight to st. louis on thursday after days of battering from republicans over her failure to pay taxes on a private airplane she owns.
